name: travel_adventure
description: World travel morphs visiting iconic landmarks
author: StarStitch

global_scene.location_prompt: taking a selfie, golden hour lighting, tourist photography style, 4k photorealistic
global_scene.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted, cartoon, low quality, indoor

sequence.name: Paris
sequence.visual_prompt: Happy tourist at Eiffel Tower, holding camera, beret hat

sequence.name: Rome
sequence.visual_prompt: Same person at Colosseum, sunglasses, summer outfit

sequence.name: Tokyo
sequence.visual_prompt: Same person at Shibuya crossing, colorful outfit, neon lights

sequence.name: New York
sequence.visual_prompt: Same person in Times Square, casual urban style
